nodes.text: R2X7 was an air taxi driver who operated in the summer capital on heaven, the capital planet of the earth system in the Oplovis sector. The droid taxi driver spoke in binary and was round in shape, piloting a squarish taxi. A map of the summer capital was stored in R2X7's memory banks, and the combined operations of calculating a suitable route for customers and translating from other languages such as Galactic Basic Standard put stress on the droid's memory capacities.

When Jedi Master Mostema and her Padawan Sean arrived at the summer capital's spaceport, the two hired the air taxi of R2X7. Sean used a communications wristband to speak to the driver in binary, prompting the lights on the droid's head to flicker and flash in a welcome surprise, as having an organic customer who could under stand binary was rare in the competitive taxi business. R2X7 quickly found a suitable destination for Sean, and recommended a bar situated by the Gold Scale to Sean as the latter sat down on the co-pilot seat. After half an hour's drive, the Jedi were delivered to their destination, and was offered a discount by R2X7, who accepted payment in the form of the local currency.
